spring2026.title: Spring 2026 Photo Creator
spring2026.subtitle: Create Vietnamese New Year 2026 portraits with red ao dai, lanterns, peach blossoms, and a festive atmosphere.
spring2026.uploader_description: You can upload a face reference photo for the AI to preserve the face, eyes, nose, mouth, and identity features when generating Spring 2026 images.
spring2026.pose_fan_single: Holding fan with one hand, gentle pose
spring2026.pose_fan_double: Holding two fans, modern dynamic pose
spring2026.pose_elegant: Elegant pose, slight turn, gentle smile
spring2026.pose_side_smile: Turned slightly sideways, smiling and winking
spring2026.outfit_ao_dai_classic: Classic red ao dai with traditional patterns
spring2026.outfit_ao_dai_crane: Red ao dai with crane and floral embroidery
spring2026.outfit_ao_dai_dragon: Red ao dai with dragon and phoenix motifs
spring2026.outfit_ao_dai_kid: Cute red ao dai for children
spring2026.scene_studio_red: Red studio background, lanterns, red couplets
spring2026.scene_street_festival: Tet street festival, lanterns, Happy New Year 2026 banner
spring2026.scene_traditional_house: Traditional house, altar, five-fruit tray, lucky money envelopes
spring2026.scene_lanterns: Red lanterns, firecrackers and lucky envelopes
spring2026.scene_flowers: Peach blossoms, apricot blossoms, peonies and kumquat tree
spring2026.scene_lucky_decor: Chinese character 'Fu', red couplets and lucky decorations
spring2026.detail_ultra: Ultra Detailed, focus on ao dai texture and lighting
spring2026.prompt_placeholder: e.g., add fireworks in the background, more peach blossoms on the right, luxury studio style...
spring2026.error_no_credits: You have run out of credits. Please sign in with another account or contact admin to buy more.
spring2026.error_generic: An error occurred while generating the Spring 2026 image. Please try again later.
spring2026.regen_placeholder: e.g., make the smile brighter, add more flowers, brighter lighting...
